text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1897 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; April * 17 – Harald Sæverud, organist, composer, and conductor (died 1992). ==See also== * 1897 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1890s in Norwegian music
